thumb.title: Rainy Knight - Everything Starts from the Rain ( Official Music Video )
thumb.description: Instagram : Rainyknight_officialAfter a long journey, Miya's body had reached his limits, and he seemed like he couldn't go on any longer.... He reminisced about the joyful times spent with Rainy Knights, feeling like this might be the scene upon entering heaven.Just then, in the distance, a musical call, sounding familiar, reached his ears. Miya gritted his teeth, summoned the last of his strength, and raced towards the source.“Miya..?”Finally, bathed in the radiance of the Eternal Flowers, Miya was back in Rainy Knights' embrace, reuniting the long-lost Rainy Knights' squad.
